summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 FORD ESCAPE. WHILE DRIVING 20 MPH, THE VEHICLE SHOOK AND THE STEERING WAS DIFFICULT TO TURN AND FAILED TO MANEUVER. ALSO, THE POWER ASSIST FAULT WARNING INDICATOR ILLUMINATED. THE CONTACT CALLED A LOCAL DEALER (CARUSO FORD LINCOLN, 3500 CHERRY AVE, LONG BEACH, CA 90807) AND WAS INFORMED TO SCHEDULE A SERVICE APPOINTMENT. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE ISSUE, BUT NO FURTHER ASSISTANCE WAS PROVIDED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 94,000.
